AboutMe

I am a Mathematics-Computer Science graduate from the University of California, San Diego. I aim to utilize my software developmement skills and experiences to incorporate quality-driven, user-centric, and scalable software in all my projects. During my time at University and after, I have been given the opportunity to cultivate my skills working on small teams including a small startup ( Kalloc Studios).


Besides creating and developing software, I also enjoy going to the gym, hanging out with friends, and binge watching Netflix.

WorkExperience

  • Kalloc Studios
  • October 2018 - August 2019
  • Junior Programmer

As a junior programmer at Kalloc studios I was responsible for researching and implementing new analysis and visualization features, improving and enhancing usability for existing futures, debug and fix bugs for any projects in need, and learn new workflows and Architecture, Engineering and Construction (AEC) standards. I also work on the mobile platform for both iOS and Android platform developing the C++ code base over to Java and Objective C. I have integrated complex systems such as visibility overrides, sequence animations, 4D scheduling, and vehicle animations.
